thinkpol.parsers package¶

Submodules¶

thinkpol.parsers.parse_color_image module¶

thinkpol.parsers.parse_color_image.parse_color_image(snapshot, data_dir=None)¶

Gets a snapshot containing a path to raw color image data, parses that data and saves it in a path depending on the optional data_dir argument, and returns information about that snapshot in json format.

Parameters

  • snapshot (json) – the snapshot we’re parsing

  • data_dir (str, optional) – the directory in which we want to save the parsed image

Returns

a json containing information about the snapshot, including the address

of the parsed color image we’ve saved :rtype: json

thinkpol.parsers.parse_depth_image module¶

thinkpol.parsers.parse_depth_image.parse_depth_image(snapshot, data_dir=None)¶

Gets a snapshot containing a path to raw depth image data, parses that data and saves it in a path depending on the optional data_dir argument, and returns information about that snapshot in json format.

Parameters

  • snapshot (json) – the snapshot we’re parsing

  • data_dir (str, optional) – the directory in which we want to save the parsed image

Returns

a json containing information about the snapshot, including the address

of the parsed depth image we’ve saved :rtype: json

thinkpol.parsers.parse_feelings module¶

thinkpol.parsers.parse_feelings.parse_feelings(snapshot, data_dir=None)¶

Gets a json dict with snapshot data including feelings, and returns another json with differently formatted data.

Parameters

snapshot (json) – the snapshot we’re parsing

Returns

a json containing information about the snapshot.

Return type

json

thinkpol.parsers.parse_pose module¶

thinkpol.parsers.parse_pose.parse_pose(snapshot, data_dir=None)¶

Gets a json dict with snapshot data including pose data, and returns another json with differently formatted data.

Parameters

snapshot (json) – the snapshot we’re parsing

Returns

a json containing information about the snapshot.

Return type

json

thinkpol.parsers.parser_utils module¶

A collection of common utilities used by one or more of the parsers.

param DATA_DIR

the directory in which that parsed images

are saved by default :type DATA_DIR: str :param lock: a threading lock used by the get_file_path function to make sure images are saved properly :type lock: Lock

thinkpol.parsers.parser_utils.extract_metadata(json_snap)¶

Gets a dictionary with snapshot data and returns a dictionary containing only data about the user.

Parameters

json_snap (json) – the json containing the snapshot data

Returns

the dictionary containing user data

Return type

dict

thinkpol.parsers.parser_utils.get_file_path(snapshot, type, data_dir='/home/user/Thinkpol/docs/parsed_data')¶

Gets a snapshot and returns file paths for the parsed color/depth image (depending on type).

Parameters

  • snapshot (json) – the snapshot containing the raw data paths

  • type (str) – the type of image whose path we need (‘color’/’depth’)

  • data_dir (str, optional) – the root directory of the new file paths, defaults to DATA_DIR

Returns

path of the new file

Return type

str

Raises

ValueError

Module contents¶

A collection of functions and classes that parse various parts of users’ cogintion snapshots.

thinkpol.parsers.parse(field, data)¶

Parses the data with the parser that corresponds to field.

Parameters

  • field (str) – the type of data we need to parse

  • data (json) – the data we need to parse

Returns

the result of parsing the data

Return type

json
